description:
A rechargeable lithium-ion battery for Petzl® Swift RL headlamps. Pick one up as a replacement, or as a spare for quick change-outs.

  • Rechargeable up to 300 times (beyond that, capacity is approximately 30% reduced)
  • Indicator lights for both remaining power and charge status
  • Easily charges via micro USB
  • IPX4 water proofing means the power keeps flowing rain to shine
  • 2,350mAh capacity
  • Compatible withPetzl Swift RL headlamp
name: Petzl Swift RL Battery
